name: Cosmos Chaos!
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

BRAIN BUSTING BEDLAM!

Get ready for an exciting and challenging role playing adventure where players will need to apply their knowledge and skills to conquer a universe of out of this world characters and unbelievable places and challenges. Accompanied by your trusty Buddy Bot you'll need to earn power ups to complete scores of combat missions as you battle incredibly evil, nasty and at times totally bizarre evil bots and their dastardly leader, Dr. Z.

It's up to you bring back your best friend and pup Hugo and save the world in the process. But be prepared...This is no ordinary walk in the park.

It's an adventure like no other, featuring
  • A turn based robot battle system
  • Diverse interactive environments
  • Vocab-building minigames
  • Exclamation Point!!!
developedBy: Aloha Island, Inc., Pacific Resources for Education and Learning
